ioformat.images

Class SiftUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.images.SiftUtil

  • public class SiftUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the import from SiftWin SIFT keyfiles and the related format conversions..

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SiftUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void generateARFFHeaderForSIFT(java.io.PrintWriter pw, int descSize)
      Generates an ARFF header for a SIFT feature DataSet.
      static LFeatRepresentation importFeaturesFromArff(java.lang.String inPath)
      Loads the SIFTRepresentation from an ARFF file.
      static LFeatRepresentation importFeaturesFromSift(java.io.File keyFile)
      Imports the features from a SiftWin keyfile into a SIFTRepresentation object.
      static void siftDirectory(java.io.File inputDirectory, java.io.File displayDirectory, java.io.File resultDirectory)
      Extracts SIFT features from a directory of image files.
      static void siftDirectoryToArffStreamAppend(java.lang.String inPath, int descSize, java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Recursively loads the data from a directory of SiftWin generated SIFT keyfiles into a stream in the data format for inclusion in the final combined ARFF file that would contain all of the SIFT data from all the files.
      static void siftFile(java.io.File inputFile, java.io.File outputFile, java.lang.String paramsString)
      This method extracts the SIFT features from a file.
      static void siftFileToArffStreamAppend(java.lang.String inFilePath, int descSize, java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Recursively loads the data from a single file of SiftWin generated SIFT keyfiles into a stream in the data format for inclusion in the final combined ARFF file that would contain all of the SIFT data from all the files.
      static void siftFolderToOneArffFile(java.lang.String inPath, java.lang.String outPath)
      This method takes the features from a directory of SiftWin keyfiles and loads them all into a single representation that is persisted in the ARFF format at the final destination.
      static void siftToArffFile(java.lang.String inFilePath, java.lang.String outFilePath)
      This method transforms one SiftWin keyfile to an ARFF file in the specified location.
      static void siftToArffFolder(java.lang.String inFolderPath, java.lang.String outFolderPath)
      This method does a batch conversion as it reads a directory of SiftWin keyfiles and outputs a directory of ARFF files containing the SIFT representations.

        public static LFeatRepresentation importFeaturesFromSift(java.io.File keyFile)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Imports the features from a SiftWin keyfile into a SIFTRepresentation object.
        Parameters:
        keyFile - File that contains the SIFT features in the SiftWin format.
        Returns:
        SIFTRepresentation that holds the loaded features.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftToArffFolder

        public static void siftToArffFolder(java.lang.String inFolderPath,
                    java.lang.String outFolderPath)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method does a batch conversion as it reads a directory of SiftWin keyfiles and outputs a directory of ARFF files containing the SIFT representations.
        Parameters:
        inFolderPath - String that is the path to the input directory.
        outFolderPath - String that is the path to the output directory.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftToArffFile

        public static void siftToArffFile(java.lang.String inFilePath,
                  java.lang.String outFilePath)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method transforms one SiftWin keyfile to an ARFF file in the specified location.
        Parameters:
        inFilePath - String that is the path to the keyfile in SiftWin format.
        outFilePath - String that is the path to the output ARFF feature file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftFolderToOneArffFile

        public static void siftFolderToOneArffFile(java.lang.String inPath,
                           java.lang.String outPath)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method takes the features from a directory of SiftWin keyfiles and loads them all into a single representation that is persisted in the ARFF format at the final destination.
        Parameters:
        inPath - String that is the input path for the SiftWin keyfile directory.
        outPath - String that is the output path for the ARFF file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftDirectoryToArffStreamAppend

        public static void siftDirectoryToArffStreamAppend(java.lang.String inPath,
                                   int descSize,
                                   java.io.PrintWriter pw)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Recursively loads the data from a directory of SiftWin generated SIFT keyfiles into a stream in the data format for inclusion in the final combined ARFF file that would contain all of the SIFT data from all the files.
        Parameters:
        inPath - String that is the path to the input directory.
        descSize - Integer that is the SIFT descriptor size.
        pw - PrintWriter that is the current output stream.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftFileToArffStreamAppend

        public static void siftFileToArffStreamAppend(java.lang.String inFilePath,
                              int descSize,
                              java.io.PrintWriter pw)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Recursively loads the data from a single file of SiftWin generated SIFT keyfiles into a stream in the data format for inclusion in the final combined ARFF file that would contain all of the SIFT data from all the files.
        Parameters:
        inFilePath - String that is the path to the input file.
        descSize - Integer that is the SIFT descriptor size.
        pw - PrintWriter that is the current output stream.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftDirectory

        public static void siftDirectory(java.io.File inputDirectory,
                 java.io.File displayDirectory,
                 java.io.File resultDirectory)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Extracts SIFT features from a directory of image files.
        Parameters:
        inputDirectory - Input directory.
        displayDirectory - File that is the directory to be used for PGM images that have to be generated as a step in the process.
        resultDirectory - Directory where to store the extracted featues.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • siftFile

        public static void siftFile(java.io.File inputFile,
            java.io.File outputFile,
            java.lang.String paramsString)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method extracts the SIFT features from a file.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - Input image file.
        outputFile - Output file for the features.
        paramsString - String holding additional command line parameters for SiftWin.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
